mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2AccDay@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `IncrValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `Value` double DEFAULT NULL, `ValueValid` bit(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2AccHour@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `IncrValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `Value` double DEFAULT NULL, `ValueValid` bit(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2Acc@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `IncrValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `Value` double DEFAULT NULL, `ValueValid` bit(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2AiMaxDay@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `MaxValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `MaxValueTime` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `MinValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `MinValueTime` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `AverageValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `Value` double DEFAULT NULL, `ValueValid` bit(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2AiMaxHour@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `MaxValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `MaxValueTime` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `MinValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `MinValueTime` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `AverageValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `Value` double DEFAULT NULL, `ValueValid` bit(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2AiMaxMonth@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `MaxValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `MaxValueTime` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `MinValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `MinValueTime` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `AverageValue` double DEFAULT NULL, `Value` double DEFAULT NULL, `ValueValid` bit(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2QualAiDay@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Normal` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Hi` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_HiHi` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Lo` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_LoLo` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Invalid` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_Hi` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_HiHi` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_Lo` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_LoLo` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2QualAiMonth@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Normal` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Hi` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_HiHi` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Lo` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_LoLo` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Invalid` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_Hi` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_HiHi` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_Lo` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_LoLo` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2QualCommDay@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Unkown` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Normal` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Interrupt` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_Interrupt` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2QualCommMonth@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Unkown` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Normal` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Interrupt` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_Interrupt` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2QualDiDay@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_1` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_0` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Invalid` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_1to0` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_0to1` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `IO_Sta2QualDiMonth@{suffix}` ( `RecTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `PtId` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_1` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_0` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualitySeconds_Invalid` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_1to0` int(11) NOT NULL, `QualityCount_0to1` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`RecTime`,`PtId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
